reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Barbazetto is extremely thorough, kind, and caring.  She took the time to explain all aspects of my surgery and care.  She made me feel relaxed and confident that I would be ok.
Outstanding Doctor. Very thorough. Office staff is all terrific
She is an amazing Dr. very professional and explains everything  thoroughly. I have great respect and admiration for her.

Very professional office. No wait time. Conscientious about masks and spacing in waiting room, which is important during Covid.

Dr Barbazetto is very communicative and I know I’m in good hands with her care.
A fabulous DR. Very professional.Great bedside manner
